players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Alice: I’m shocked Diana was killed so quickly. We need to be careful who we trust. I think we should focus on gathering more information before rushing to vote."
Bob: "Alice, I agree we need more info, but staying silent won’t help. Charlie, you haven’t said anything yet—what do you think about the kill? Any suspicions?"
Bob: "Alice, you’re pushing to gather info but haven’t shared any thoughts yourself. Charlie, silence isn’t helping; are you hiding something? We need to start pointing fingers or this mafia wins."
You: "Alice: Bob, I see your point about needing to act, but rushing might get us all killed. Charlie, if you’re innocent, sharing your thoughts now could help build trust."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Alice: I’m shocked Diana was killed so quickly. We need to be careful who we trust. I think we should focus on gathering more information before rushing to vote."
Bob: "Alice, I agree we need more info, but staying silent won’t help. Charlie, you haven’t said anything yet—what do you think about the kill? Any suspicions?"
Bob: "Alice, you’re pushing to gather info but haven’t shared any thoughts yourself. Charlie, silence isn’t helping; are you hiding something? We need to start pointing fingers or this mafia wins."
Alice: "Alice: Bob, I see your point about needing to act, but rushing might get us all killed. Charlie, if you’re innocent, sharing your thoughts now could help build trust."
